Changelog:
Fixed getconnections not correctly identifying OnceConnections on TouchedConnections
Fixed getconnections not destroying the connection after Fire/Defer call for OnceConnections
:Disconnect now destroys the connection, use :Disable if you intend to re-enable or access any fields for any reason
Blocked file writes with malicious extensions
New fields to getconnections
- getconnections(x)[1].OnceConnection <bool> 
- getconnections(x)[1].WaitConnection <bool> 
- getconnections(x)[1].TouchedConnection <bool> 
Fixed filtergc
Fixed a issue where string encryption would cause Roblox to crash on initialization & game join & game leave etc
Fixed teleports (probably)
getgc improvements
debug.getproto inactive proto bug fix
capabilities improvements
